name: Pause Screen From Battletoads
description:
You must escape from the pause screen from Battletoads!

A glitch game inspired by Corrypt and Frog Fractions created for Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam 2015.

The point of the game is figuring out how to play. If you are frustrated, there is a Help Screen that may aid you. Also: Avoid spamming the keys as you could skip important clues. Pressing "R" will restart the room you are in.

Thanks to Rare LTD. and Idle Thumbs community forums.
